items.sentence: I have the feeling that my French isn\'t getting much better.
Mary and her boyfriend are planning to visit Boston together.
No one has the right to tell me how I can spend my own money.
Tom picked his toys up off the floor and put them in the box.
I was the one who convinced Tom to teach Mary how to do that.
I wonder if Tom would be willing to help me with my homework.
I wonder whether or not Tom could help us solve this problem.
Tom told me that he\'s been living in Boston for three years.
Tom and Mary were speaking loud enough for John to hear them.
Tom wants to know which of the books is the most interesting.
